General.Name: Xinjiang Communications Construction Group Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Xinjiang Communications Construction Group Co., Ltd. constructs transportation infrastructure. It engages in the survey, design, construction, and operation on highway and bridges; provision of water conservancy, railway, and tunnel and municipal works; processing and manufacturing of traffic construction materials; and warehousing logistics, etc. The company is also involved in the bridge and tunnel excavation, municipal and subway works, technical maintenance, traffic engineering, intelligence communications, engineering budget, equipment rental, and design and consulting services. It serves customers in Xinjiang, Sichuan, Hunan, Tibet, Guizhou, Cameroon, Mongolia, etc. Xinjiang Communications Construction Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Urumqi, China.
